name: astrogency
title: Astrogency
desc: The Astro Agency template with Storyblok CMS
article:
Astrogency is a versatile, modern template built for creative agencies and freelancers seeking a professional online presence. With performance and ease of use at its core, it delivers both speed and sustainabilityâachieving a mobile PageSpeed score of 98-100 and an impressive A+ energy label (~0.07g COâ per view).


  • Easy Styling: Customize colors and fonts directly from your CMS.
  • Quick Setup: Configure your Storyblok CMS space with just a few clicks using our importer.
  • Multi-Language Ready: Expand your reach with multi-language support out of the box.
  • Flexible Page Builder: Style-ready blocks let you design your pages, posts, services, and work collections effortlessly.
